Description: Squat jar of marl pottery with rounded base, convex sides and flat ledge rim, two tubular handles on shoulder. The exterior is decorated in purple paint with panels filled with wavy lines, the rim top is decorated with cross-hatching.
Curator's comments: Similar to Decorated ware D68a in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921).
Condition: fair (worn and extraneous deposit on exterior), rim chipped, base worn.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
